snippet: Florida is seeking court approval for changes that narrow the time frame for early voting and place more stringent restrictions on voter registration groups.
lead_paragraph: Florida is seeking court approval for changes that narrow the time frame for early voting and place more stringent restrictions on voter registration groups.

headline.seo: Justice Department Calls for Trial in Florida Voting Dispute
headline.main: Justice Department Seeks Trial on Florida Elections
headline.print_headline: Justice Department Seeks Trial on Florida Elections
